Audio.Author: Richard Hoyer
Audio.Comments: Two song types, natural progression. File edited to remove egregious handling noise, Audacity Low Pass filter and Noise Removal. Olympus LS-11 and Sennheiser ME67. Bird on nest about 120 meter away, but this bird came in from opposite direction of nest, which on the next morning had an adult on a small downy chick.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
